BLUETOOTH_OFF.suggestion: Enable Bluetooth in System Settings (Command + Space, type "Bluetooth")

DEVICE_NOT_FOUND.suggestion:
Make sure that:
  - Scale is turned on (step on it)
  - You are in range (< 5 meters)
  - Xiaomi Home app is closed

CONNECTION_TIMEOUT.suggestion:
Try:
  - Turn Bluetooth off and on
  - Get closer to the scale
  - Remove obstacles between devices

READ_FAILED.message: Failed to read data from scale
READ_FAILED.suggestion: Scale may have disconnected. Try to measure again.

DECRYPTION_FAILED.suggestion: BLE key may be incorrect. Check configuration in Settings or export the key again from Xiaomi Cloud.

INVALID_DATA.suggestion: Measurement may have been interrupted. Stand still throughout the measurement.
